H1.text: who changed the role of the first lady. Abigail Adams

H2.text: who changed the role of the first lady. Julia Tyler

H3.text: who changed the role of the first lady. Dolley Madison

A4.text: Dolley Madison helped define the official functions, decorated the Executive Mansion, and welcomed visitors in her drawing room.

A5.text: The term first lady was not yet in use, but her role as hostess became official when her husband assumed the presidency.
